title: Lost LP due to afk from a possible bug?
body:
So i personally think this is a new client issue as i have never had an issue on the old client.

I was loading into a game and i got the error that something along the lines of i lost internet check it and reconnect, so i tried reconnecting a few times and it just repetitively said no, like it wasnt even checking the connection it was damn near instant. 

I tried to restart the client but i still didnt make it in time because it took me a little bit to notice it just wasnt opening because (while i had closed out of the client) the .exe was still in my background

as well as that usually if my internet lags out during a game, i'll reconnect and it will say i disconnected from chat attempting to reconnect in the client, even though i reconnected in the game. And it never reconnects, so i will have to reset my client then too.

replies.body: Once champion select is over, you switch from the client to the game so any errors you receive are not related to the updated version.  The error you're receiving is also more specifically related to a network problem that's failing to reach the game servers.  If you return to the legacy client, it's likely that you'll find the same error.  Run through the instructions in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up and get back in game!  Let me know if you have any questions!
